taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe astereae;genus herrickia;species kingii;variety kingii

bio:treatment.description: Leaves entire. Ray florets white to pale lavender. 2n = 18.
Rocky slopes and cliff crevices of mountains in subalpine coniferous forests, douglas fir-white fir, mountain brush and cottonwood communities, on calcareous or granitic substrates;
bio:treatment.discussion: Variety kingii is known only from the Wasatch Mountains, from Mt. Nebo northwards (Juab, Millard, and Salt Lake counties).
